tasks.label: Deploy GeneralsXZH (Windows)
args: $ZhExe = '${workspaceFolder}\\build\\win32\\GeneralsMD\\Release\\GeneralsXZH.exe'; $DeployDir = "$env:USERPROFILE\\GeneralsX\\GeneralsMD"; $FmtDll = 'C:\vcpkg\buildtrees\fmt\x86-windows-rel\bin\fmt.dll'; if (-not (Test-Path $FmtDll)) { $FmtDll = 'C:\vcpkg\installed\x86-windows\bin\fmt.dll' }; if (Test-Path $ZhExe) { Copy-Item -Path $ZhExe -Destination $DeployDir -Force; if (Test-Path $FmtDll) { Copy-Item -Path $FmtDll -Destination $DeployDir -Force; Write-Host "Deploy successful: $DeployDir\\GeneralsXZH.exe and fmt.dll (from $FmtDll)" -ForegroundColor Green } else { Write-Host "Deploy successful: $DeployDir\\GeneralsXZH.exe (WARNING: fmt.dll not found at any location!)" -ForegroundColor Yellow } } else { Write-Host "Error: Executable not found at $ZhExe" -ForegroundColor Red }

tasks.label: Deploy GeneralsX (Windows)
args: $GenExe = '${workspaceFolder}\\build\\win32\\Generals\\Release\\GeneralsX.exe'; $DeployDir = "$env:USERPROFILE\\GeneralsX\\Generals"; $FmtDll = 'C:\vcpkg\buildtrees\fmt\x86-windows-rel\bin\fmt.dll'; if (-not (Test-Path $FmtDll)) { $FmtDll = 'C:\vcpkg\installed\x86-windows\bin\fmt.dll' }; if (Test-Path $GenExe) { Copy-Item -Path $GenExe -Destination $DeployDir -Force; if (Test-Path $FmtDll) { Copy-Item -Path $FmtDll -Destination $DeployDir -Force; Write-Host "Deploy successful: $DeployDir\\GeneralsX.exe and fmt.dll (from $FmtDll)" -ForegroundColor Green } else { Write-Host "Deploy successful: $DeployDir\\GeneralsX.exe (WARNING: fmt.dll not found at any location!)" -ForegroundColor Yellow } } else { Write-Host "Error: Executable not found at $GenExe" -ForegroundColor Red }

tasks.label: Run GeneralsXZH (Windows MSVC2022)
args: cd $env:USERPROFILE\GeneralsX\GeneralsMD; if (Test-Path .\GeneralsXZH.exe) { .\GeneralsXZH.exe -win -noshellmap 2>&1 | Tee-Object -FilePath ${workspaceFolder}\logs\runTerminal_msvc2022.log } else { Write-Host 'Error: GeneralsXZH.exe not found. Run Deploy task first.' -ForegroundColor Red }

tasks.label: Run GeneralsX (Windows MSVC2022)
args: cd $env:USERPROFILE\GeneralsX\Generals; if (Test-Path .\GeneralsX.exe) { .\GeneralsX.exe -win 2>&1 | Tee-Object -FilePath ${workspaceFolder}\logs\runTerminal_generals_msvc2022.log } else { Write-Host 'Error: GeneralsX.exe not found. Run Deploy task first.' -ForegroundColor Red }

tasks.label: Debug GeneralsXZH (Windows MSVC2022)
args: cd $env:USERPROFILE\GeneralsX\GeneralsMD; if (Test-Path .\GeneralsXZH.exe) { Write-Host 'Starting WinDbg debugger...' -ForegroundColor Cyan; windbg.exe .\GeneralsXZH.exe -win 2>&1 | Tee-Object -FilePath ${workspaceFolder}\logs\debugTerminal_msvc2022.log } else { Write-Host 'Error: GeneralsXZH.exe not found. Run Deploy task first.' -ForegroundColor Red }

Run Deploy task first.' -ForegroundColor Red }
